content: the left pocket with the and knit 2 stitches out of every 3 row down the first stitch from the body of the jacket continue opposite side of the vest when you come to the until all the left pocket stitches have been joined side of the pocket you will be picking up a stitch knit across until ---- ---- ---- ---- 11118888 11118888 22222222 22224444 22224444 22224444 through both the pocket and jacket joining them 22224444 22228888 22228888 22228888 stitches remain if you need to together adjust your stitch count to be a multiple of 4 do so evenly between the two pockets knit together knit 2222 2222 2222 2222 2222 2222 2222 3333 3333 3333 3333 3333 3333 3333 row of one stitch from the right pocket with 1 stitch from 2x2 rib starting with p2 on the wrong side and k2 the body of the jacket continue until all the right on the right side pocket stitches have been joined to the jacket bbbbuuuuttttttttoooonnnnhhhhoooolllleeee rrrroooowwww knit a row in 2x2 rib evenly wwwwiiiitttthhhhoooouuuutttt ppppoooocccckkkkeeeettttssss spacing buttonholes on one side using yo p2tog or yo k2tog make sure that your top buttonhole is knit across you may need to adjust your stitch below the last increase for the v neckline count to be a multiple of 4 if you are knitting for a boy knit the buttonholes on hhhheeeemmmm the left side when worn and for a girl place them row 1 p3 k2 *p2 k2 repeat from * until 3 on the right side stitches remain p3 knit 2222 2222 2222 2222 2222 2222 2222 3333 3333 3333 3333 3333 3333 3333 row of row 2 k3 p2 *k2 p2 repeat from * until 3 2x2 rib starting with p2 on the wrong side and k2 stitches remain k3 on the right side repeat row 1 & 2 for a total of 7 row cast off in pattern cast off in pattern until one stitch remains © button & tasha spare needle rosalie katie stacie laura bron krissie using a 4mm needle and cc start at the back edge vic kath pip julie zaviera ali anna ida of the underarm cast on pick up and knit 1 stitch michaela rachel l isa rachael lisa per cast on stitch then pick up and knit 2 stitches tammy melissa and zofia ☺ for every 3 row up the side of the armholes knit across the live stitches and then pick up and knit 2 stitches for every 3 row down the side of the arm hole place marker and join in the round make sure your stitch count is a multiple of 4 knit 5555 5555 5555 5555 5555 5555 5555 6666 6666 6666 6666 6666 6666 6666 rounds in 2x2 rib
